duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical and managerial leadership to engineers and managers in multiple locations across the United States.
Define and implement the technical development strategy for the Cybersecurity and Advanced Platforms Subdivision.
Direct program staffing by allocating resources across multiple departments.
Implement cross organizational and cross discipline technical research and development projects.
Recruit and hire high quality technical talent in the fields of cybersecurity, cloud computing, embedded systems, and software development.
Ensure quality of technical products and deliverables.
Perform information technology (IT) research and development.
Provide leadership on the future direction of IT for customers.
Analyze ground, cloud, embedded, and space systems for cyber vulnerabilities and recommend solutions.
Lead the development of cutting-edge prototypes in both ground and spacecraft systems.
Develop and mentor Managers and Directors within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, electrical engineering, computer engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
